message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the development of a machine-learning-based toxicity model to assess the hostility of a comment in online communities. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-categories related to natural language processing (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), cybersecurity (cs.CR), machine learning (cs.LG), and computational linguistics (cs.CY).
